# StructureBuilder

**Class**

An object that combines multiple scan sessions into a single captured result.

## Declaration

```swift
class StructureBuilder
```

## Overview

This class in conjunction with [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/CapturedStructure] enables an app to export a 3D model that consists of multiple [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/CapturedRoom] instances. First, combine the rooms into a single captured result by calling [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/StructureBuilder/capturedStructure(from:)]. Then, generate a 3D model of the whole structure by calling [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/CapturedStructure/export(to:metadataURL:modelProvider:exportOptions:)].

## Creating a structure builder

- **init(options:)**: Creates a structure builder using the specified options.
- **StructureBuilder.ConfigurationOptions**: Options that configure a structure builder.

## Building a captured structure

- **capturedStructure(from:)**: Combines the argument captured rooms into a single unit.

## Interpreting build errors

- **StructureBuilder.BuildError**: Errors that can occur during the multiple-scan merging process.

## 3D Asset Output

- **Providing custom models for captured rooms and structure exports**: Enhance the look of an exported 3D model by substituting object bounding boxes with detailed 3D renditions.
- **RoomBuilder**: An object that generates a 3D asset from room-capture data.
- **CapturedRoom.USDExportOptions**: Options that determine the underlying data format of a scan export.
